pullrequest.title: Static camera when following a model

content.raw: The problem is that the camera is configured to inherit the yaw rotation of the tracked visual, and with a rolling sphere, this means that it will alternate between 0 and PI, hence the jumps. I added an option to configure whether this behaviour should be activated or not. For aircrafts, it makes sense to enable it by default.
